Hi dear forum friends.
It has passed 2 weeks after we acquired Viking Layer and it is time to present new Viking Layer point of presence.
We are happy to present you High performance pure RAID 10 SSD VPS plans hosted on Intel E3 1240v3 platform.

**Viking Farmer**  
Open VZ  
1 CPU Core  
128 MB DDR3 RAM  
256 MB Burstable  
5GB RAID10 SSD  
256GB @ 1gbit  
1 IPv4  
NO IPv6  
Buffalo via CC  
€1 p/ month or €10 p/ year  
[**Become a Viking now**](https://vikinglayer.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=23)

[**Become a Viking now**](https://vikinglayer.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=24)

!!!Limited Offer!!! ONLY 5 AVAILABLE

[**Become a Viking now**](https://vikinglayer.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=26)  

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

We made 3 nodes cluster. Each node is equipped with:
E3 1240v3  
32 GB DDR3 RAM  
4 x 512GB SAMSUNG SSD  
1 GBPS network uplink  
Hosted in Buffalo via ColoCrossing  

Test ip: 198.12.127.26
